message: My money's on Instagram
Agreed. Or GroupMe or Beluga.
Hadn't heard of Beluga. Good to know!
Instagram is going to be massive too, but it already is so that's not really fair
Yeah, I think one of the group texting things is going to blow up.
of course, so is something like textPlus
but i think GroupMe, Beluga, Yobongo, HeyTell, all will be battling, though each is different
does anyone use textplus?

I'm hoping MyFavorites is going to help everyone out with finding real-time favorites by people. We're submitting the iphone app tomorrow for Apple's approval. Android app will be done next week [we're using Titanium]. If you want in on the beta, http://myfavorites.com
Interesting that Quora is not on the radar despite all the techcrunch hype, nor is path.
Convore iPhone app! (wishful thinking can't hurt, right?)
Hashable is looking to make some noise. They have 30 people coming to Austin.
Is Beluga gonna be splashing out or keeping it quiet right after an acquisition? http://news.cnet.com/8301-13577_3-20037955-36.html My guess is the latter.
Lanyrd!
@parislemon GroupMe for social chat...  Blekko for search...  posterous' new app could dark horse
@aplusk Yeah, it'll be interesting to see how posterous does, could be a dark horse
@aplusk I like GroupMe too, now that I feel like Beluga is out of the running...and after GroupMe added everything that really set Beluga apart.
@rwwmike But it never seems to work properly for me for various reasons
@rwwmike I thought for a while Bump would do that
Definitely interested in seeing what Hashable can do, too. Anything that could finally kill the business card would help.

The biggest problem with Bump for that was that it had to be truly ubiquitous. I agree, though, that's what I was hoping for. I think all you really need for Hashable, though, is for both of you to have Twitter accounts, because you both use an @mention to log the contact in Hashable...so there's your business card.
@rwwmike damn, i just dropped $100 on legacy, analog, carbon based biz cards. i hope you're right.
We think we've got a shot:  http://www.macstories.net/reviews/tinyvox-is-a-social-tape-deck-for-your-iphone/
these are my picks for this year at sxsw - http://www.readwriteweb.com/archives/5_absolute_must-have_apps_to_rock_sxsw_interactive.php
@rwwmike Awesome, I think that's a pretty good list
@ericflo Of course, on the group chat, Beluga has been my favorite, but if you don't want to have to change horses mid-race...you might want to just go with Group Me for now...
@rwwmike I just use a private Convore group :)
How do I change my avatar here?
@parislemon i think Instagram needs a new update to make search by taga easier.
Go with yobongo :)
